text:
Burial and Cremation Amendment Regulations 2018

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Burial and Cremation Act 2002 .

18 December 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Burial and Cremation Amendment Regulations 2018 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which the Burial and Cremation Amendment Act 2018 commences.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Burial and Cremation Regulations 2015 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Burial and Cremation Regulations 2015 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Burial and Cremation Regulations 2015 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2018

These regulations are administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
